text: Allen Crombie (born 16 October 1961) is an English former footballer who made 1 appearance as a midfielder for Lincoln City, playing against Sutton United on 17 February 1988. Two months later he was loaned to Boston United, for whom he went on to make 54 appearances following a £2500 transfer in July 1988. He later managed Lincoln United and Grantham Town. == References == Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Boston United F.C. players Category:Lincoln City F.C. players Category:Lincoln United F.C. players Category:National League (English football) players Category:Northern Premier League players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Allen Crombie
